title: Petite Wyrm
text: A petite wyrm native to the cavern, clad in sand, ochre, teal hues. Known for its lithe and swift nature.

image.style: illustration, fantasy, centered subject, high detail
image.description: A petite wyrm in a cavern biome, lithe, swift. The scene is colored with the hues of sand, ochre, teal.
